name: Shoot & Destroy X
description:
Shoot - Destroy - Save the Galaxy 

                       

An outer space menace is at large destroying and conquering the galaxy.
It's up to you, the lone aircraft pilot, to fly up there and put an end to it.
     

Shoot & Destroy X is an extended edition celebrating this
1-bit shoot'em up's 10th anniversary. 

4 Levels, 3 Power-Ups, 3 Bosses - 20 minutes each playthrough.  

Includes a save system to save your score and 3 hidden achievements.

Controller Support.

                 
                        

Created by Samuel Sousa
with Music by Shawn Andrew 

                

                       
NOTE: 
Android version is only playable using a controller:
OUYA, MOJO, Nvidia Shield, phones / tablets require bluetooth or usb ports,
